## rds-table Readme



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


### Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                                                                                          | Type      | Default           |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------------- |
| `caption`       | `caption`        | Sets caption text for table component. This is for accessibility purposes. Text is visually hidden but accessible to screen readers. | `string`  | `'Table Caption'` |
| `compact`       | `compact`        | Sets the table cell's padding to 'compact' mode.                                                                                     | `boolean` | `false`           |
| `groupedRows`   | `grouped-rows`   | Sets the table row's to 'group' mode.                                                                                                | `boolean` | `false`           |
| `mobileStacked` | `mobile-stacked` | Sets the table top column to 'stacked' mode and turn into a card view on mobile.                                                     | `boolean` | `false`           |
| `striped`       | `striped`        | Sets the table row's background color to 'striped' mode.                                                                             | `boolean` | `false`           |
| `verticalLines` | `vertical-lines` | Adds `vertical lines` between table columns.                                                                                         | `boolean` | `false`           |


### Slots

| Slot     | Description                                 |
| -------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| `"body"` | Used to add table rows to the table's body. |
| `"head"` | Used to add table rows to the table's head. |


----------------------------------------------
